EmailTemplate.description: Use to respond to the Business Requestor when a revision is published.
EmailTemplate.name: Content Response - Revision Published
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Reason__c} {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.User__c},
The document {!Case.Document_Name__c} has been revised and a new version has been published to the {!Case.To_be_published_in__c}.
Please reply to this email with any questions.
Thank you, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Content Management Sales Operations & Training
